channel.title: Mf on Prabhat-The Temple of Art
channel.description: Recent content in Mf on Prabhat-The Temple of Art

item.title: Prabhat training
item.description: Rohit Bhat: Rohit Bhat has completed Vidwath exams in Carnatic Classical music under the able tutoring of Vid. S Shankar. An Ananya awardee, Rohit Bhat, is an active artist at Radio Mirchi 98.
